scripts.db: docker kill surrealDB 2>/dev/null; docker run --rm --name surrealDB --detach -p 8000:8000 surrealdb/surrealdb:latest start --user root --pass root memory && npx ts-node database/surrealdb/init.ts && docker exec -it surrealDB /surreal sql --conn http://localhost:8000 --user root --pass root --ns CHub --db CHub && docker kill surrealDB
scripts.test: tsc --noEmit && npx ts-node database/testing/SurrealDBtest.ts && npx ts-node utils/testing/upload.ts
